ui.panel.config.introduction: يمكنك هنا برمجة المكونات الخاصة بك و إعداد نظام ioBroker. ليس كل شيء متاح للبرمجة من خلال واجهة المستخدم حتى الآن، ولكننا نعمل على ذلك.
ui.panel.config.advanced_mode.hint_enabl: Missing config options? Enable advanced mode on
ui.panel.config.common.editor.confirm_un: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
ui.panel.config.areas.caption: Areas
ui.panel.config.areas.description: Group devices and entities into areas
ui.panel.config.areas.picker.introductio: يتم استخدام المناطق لتنظيم أمكنة الأجهزة. سيتم استخدام هذه المعلومات في جميع أنحاء ioBroker لمساعدتك في تنظيم الواجهة والأذونات و التكاملات مع الأنظمة الأخرى.
لوضع الأجهزة في منطقة ما، إستخدم الرابط أدناه للإنتقال إلى صفحة التكاملات ثم انقر فوق تكامل مكوّن للوصول إلى بطاقات الجهاز.

سيتم إلغاء تعيين جميع الأجهزة في هذه المنطقة.

ui.panel.config.automation.caption: الأتمتة
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.introd: محرر المتحكم الآلي يسمح لك بإنشاء وتحرير المتحكمات الآلية. يرجى قراءة [الإرشادات] (https://home-assistant.io/docs/automation/editor/) للتأكد من إعدادك ioBroker بشكل صحيح.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.no_aut: لم تعثر على أي متحكم آلي قابل للتعديل
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.only_e: Only automations defined in automations.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.dev_on: Only automations that have a unique ID assigned are debuggable.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this automation?
ui.panel.config.automation.dialog_new.ho: How do you want to create your new automation?
ui.panel.config.automation.dialog_new.th: Describe the automation you want to create
And we will try to create it for you. For example: Turn the lights off when I leave.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.introd: استخدم المتحكمات الآلية لتجعل منزلك ينبض بالحياة
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.load_e: Only automations in automations.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.unsave: لديك تغييرات غير محفوظة. هل أنت متأكد من أنك تريد أن تغادر ؟
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.bluepr: This blueprint doesn't have any inputs.
The mode controls what happens when the automation is triggered while the actions are still running from a previous trigger. Check the {documentation_link} for more info.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.trigge:
المشغلات هي ما يبدأ تشغيل قاعدة المتحكم الآلي. من الممكن تحديد مشغلات متعددة لنفس القاعدة. بمجرد بدء المشغل ، سيقوم ioBroker بالتحقق من الشروط ، إن وجدت ، واستدعاء الإجراء. 

 [مزيد من المعلومات حول المشغلات.] (https://home-assistant.io/docs/automation/trigger/)
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.condit:
الشروط هي جزء اختياري من قواعد المتحكم الآلي ويمكن استخدامها لمنع تفعّل الإجراء بالمشغل. الشروط تبدو متشابهة جدًا مع المشغلات ولكنها مختلفة جدًا. سينظر المشغل في الأحداث التي تحدث في النظام بينما ينظر الشرط فقط إلى كيفية ظهور النظام الآن. يستطيع المشغل ملاحظة أن مفتاح التشغيل تم تشغيله. بينما الشرط يرى فقط ما إذا كان أحد المفاتيح هل هو قيد التشغيل أو الإيقاف حاليًا. 

 [مزيد من المعلومات حول الشروط.] (https://home-assistant.io/docs/scripts/conditions/)
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.action:
الإجراءات هي ما سيفعله ioBroker عندما يتفعّل الجهاز المُتحَكم به.

 [مزيد من المعلومات حول الإجراءات.] (https://home-assistant.io/docs/automation/action/)
ui.panel.config.automation.thingtalk.tas: Type below what this automation should do, and we will try to convert it into a ioBroker automation.
Note: Only English is supported for now.
Enter a command or tap skip.
We couldn't create an automation for that (yet?).
ui.panel.config.automation.thingtalk.lin: Great! Now we need to link some devices
One or more devices have more than one matching entity, please pick the one you want to use.

ui.panel.config.scene.editor.entities.de: If you add an entity that belongs to a device, the device will be added.
ui.panel.config.cloud.description_featur: Control home when away and integrate with Alexa and Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.title: Cloud Login
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.introduction: ioBroker Cloud provides you with a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home. It also allows you to connect with cloud-only services: Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of ioBroker and Hass.io.
ioBroker Cloud is a subscription service with a free one month trial. No payment information necessary.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_passwo: You need to change your password before logging in.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_email_: You need to confirm your email before logging in.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.in: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.ch: Check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.title: Register Account
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.headline: Start your free trial
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: Create an account to start your free one month trial with ioBroker Cloud. No payment information necessary.
The trial will give you access to all the benefits of ioBroker Cloud, including:
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_r: Control of ioBroker away from home
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_w: Easy integration with webhook-based apps like OwnTracks
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of ioBroker and Hass.io.
By registering an account you agree to the following terms and conditions.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.account_c: Account created! Check your email for instructions on how to activate your account.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.thank_you_: Thank you for being part of ioBroker Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.integratio: Integrations for ioBroker Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your ioBroker instance publicly on the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.title: Text to Speech
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.info: Bring personality to your home by having it speak to you by using our Text-to-Speech services. You can use this in automations and scripts by using the {service} service.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.dialog: مرحبًا {name} ، يمكنك تشغيل أي نص على أي مشغل وسائط مدعوم!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.acc: Remote control is being prepared. We will notify you when it's ready.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.inf: ioBroker Cloud provides a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.ins: Your instance will be available at
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.rem: قم بتفعيل هذا الخيار للتأكد من أن ioBroker الخاص بك يمكن الوصول إليه دائمًا عن بُعد.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for ioBroker Cloud you'll be able to control all your ioBroker devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.enab: Enable the ioBroker skill for Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: If you enable state reporting, ioBroker will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: With the Google Assistant integration for ioBroker Cloud you'll be able to control all your ioBroker devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ena: Activate the ioBroker Cloud skill for Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: If you enable state reporting, ioBroker will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ent: Please enter a PIN to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this PIN when interacting with such devices via Google Assistant.
Enter a PIN to use security devices
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.syn: Failed to sync your entities to Google, ask Google 'Hey Google, sync my devices' to sync your entities.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.not: Before you can use Google Assistant, you need to activate the ioBroker Cloud skill for Google Assistant in the Google Home app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.i: Anything that is configured to be triggered by a webhook can be given a publicly accessible URL to allow you to send data back to ioBroker from anywhere, without exposing your instance to the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.n: Looks like you have no webhooks yet. Get started by configuring a
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.l: Learn more about creating webhook-powered automations.

ui.panel.config.entities.caption: Entities
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.introduc: ioBroker keeps a registry of every entity it has ever seen that can be uniquely identified. Each of these entities will have an entity ID assigned which will be reserved for just this entity.
Use the entity registry to override the name, change the entity ID or remove the entry from ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.enable_s: This will make them available in ioBroker again if they are now disabled.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.disable_: Disabled entities will not be added to ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.remove_s: You should remove them from your Lovelace config and automations if they contain these entities.

يمكنك فقط إزالة {removable} من الكيانات {selected} . لا يمكن إزالة الكيانات إلا عندما يتوقف التكامل عن توفير الكيانات. في بعض الأحيان ، يتعين عليك إعادة تشغيل ioBroker قبل أن تتمكن من إزالة كيانات التكامل الذي تمت إزالته. هل أنت متأكد من أنك تريد إزالة الكيانات القابلة للإزالة؟
ui.panel.config.person.caption: الأشخاص
ui.panel.config.person.introduction: Here you can define each person of interest in ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.person.note_about_person: ملاحظة: لا يمكن تعديل الأشخاص الذين تم تكوينهم عبر config.yaml عبر واجهة المستخدم.

ui.panel.config.zone.caption: المناطق
ui.panel.config.zone.description: إدارة المناطق التي تريد تتبع الأشخاص فيها.
ui.panel.config.zone.introduction: تسمح لك المناطق بتحديد مناطق معينة على وجه الأرض. عندما يكون الشخص داخل منطقة ما ، ستأخذ الحالة الاسم من المنطقة. يمكن أيضًا استخدام المناطق كمشغل أو حالة داخل إعدادات الأتمتة.
ui.panel.config.zone.no_zones_created_ye: Looks like you have not created any zones yet.
ui.panel.config.zone.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this zone?
ui.panel.config.zone.configured_in_yaml: لا يمكن تحرير المناطق التي تم تكوينها بواسطة configuration.yaml عبر واجهة المستخدم.
ui.panel.config.zone.edit_home_zone: The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. Drag the marker on the map to move the home zone.
ui.panel.config.zone.edit_home_zone_narr: The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. The location can be changed from the general configuration.
ui.panel.config.zone.home_zone_core_conf: The location of your home zone is editable from the general configuration page. The radius of the Home zone can't be edited from the frontend yet. Do you want to go to the general configuration?
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.name: الاسم
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.icon_error_m: Icon should be in the format ''prefix:iconname'', for example: ''mdi:home''
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.passive_note: Passive zones are hidden in the frontend and are not used as location for device trackers. This is useful if you just want to use it for automations.

ui.panel.config.integrations.confirm_new: Do you want to set up {integration}?
ui.panel.config.integrations.no_integrat: يبدو أنه لم يتم تكوين أي تكاملات بعد. انقر على الزر أدناه لإضافة تكاملك الأول!

ui.panel.config.integrations.none: لم يتم تكوين أي شيء حتى الآن
ui.panel.config.integrations.ignore.conf: هل أنت متأكد أنك لا تريد إعداد هذا التكامل؟ يمكنك التراجع بالنقر على "إظهار عمليات التكامل التي تم تجاهلها" في القائمة بأعلى اليسار.
سيؤدي ذلك إلى ظهور التكامل في عمليات التكامل المكتشفة مرة أخرى عند اكتشافها. قد يتطلب هذا إعادة تشغيل أو يستغرق بعض الوقت.

ui.panel.config.users.users_privileges_n: مجموعة المستخدمين هي عمل قيد التقدم. لن يتمكن المستخدم من إدارة المثيل عبر واجهة المستخدم. ما زلنا نقوم بتدقيق جميع نقاط نهاية واجهة برمجة تطبيقات الإدارة للتأكد من أنها تحد من الوصول إلى المسؤولين بشكل صحيح.

ui.panel.config.ozw.refresh_node.title: Refresh Node Information
ui.panel.config.ozw.refresh_node.descrip: This will tell OpenZWave to re-interview a node and update the node's command classes, capabilities, and values.
ui.panel.config.ozw.refresh_node.battery: If the node is battery powered, be sure to wake it before proceeding
ui.panel.config.ozw.refresh_node.wakeup_: Wake-up instructions are sourced from the OpenZWave community device database.

ui.panel.config.ozw.select_instance.head: Select an OpenZWave Instance
ui.panel.config.ozw.select_instance.intr: You have more than one OpenZWave instance running. Which instance would you like to manage?
ui.panel.config.ozw.select_instance.none: We couldn't find an OpenZWave instance. If you believe this is incorrect, check your OpenZWave and MQTT setups and ensure that ioBroker can communicate with your MQTT broker.
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_config.introduc: Manage the different configuration parameters for a Z-Wave node.
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_config.help_sou: Config parameter descriptions and help text are provided by the OpenZWave project.
ui.panel.config.ozw.node_config.wakeup_h: Battery powered nodes must be awake to change their configuration. If the node is not awake, OpenZWave will attempt to update the node's configuration the next time it wakes up, which could be multiple hours (or days) later. Follow these steps to wake up your device:
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.pair: Make sure your devices are in pairing mode. Check the instructions of your device on how to do this.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.no_d: لم يتم العثور على أجهزة ، تأكد من أنها في وضع الاقتران(pairing) واجعلها مستيقظة أثناء اكتشافها قيد التشغيل.
ui.panel.config.zha.clusters.help_cluste: Select a cluster to view attributes and commands.
ui.panel.config.zha.clusters.introductio: Clusters are the building blocks for Zigbee functionality. They separate functionality into logical units. There are client and server types and that are comprised of attributes and commands.
ui.panel.config.zha.cluster_attributes.h: Select an attribute to view or set its value.
Get the value for the selected attribute.
Set attribute value for the specified cluster on the specified entity.
ui.panel.config.zha.cluster_commands.hel: Select a command to interact with.
The device is ready to use
ui.panel.config.zha.network.caption: الشبكة
ui.panel.config.zha.groups.caption: Groups
ui.panel.config.zha.groups.group_details: Here are all the details for the selected Zigbee group.
ui.panel.config.zha.groups.create_group_: Enter the required details to create a new zigbee group
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.group_: Select a group to issue a bind command.
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.cluste: Select clusters to bind to the selected group.
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.bind_b: Bind the selected group to the selected device clusters.
ui.panel.config.zha.group_binding.unbind: Unbind the selected group from the selected device clusters.
ui.panel.config.zwave.migration.ozw.head: الانتقال الى OpenZWave
ui.panel.config.zwave.migration.ozw.intr: This wizard will help you migrate from the legacy Z-Wave integration to the OpenZWave integration that is currently in beta.
ui.panel.config.zwave.network_management: Run commands that affect the Z-Wave network. You won't get feedback on whether most commands succeeded, but you can check the OZW Log to try to find out.
ui.panel.config.zwave.node_management.in: قم بتشغيل أوامر Z-Wave التي تؤثر على عقدة واحدة. اختر عقدة لترى قائمة بالأوامر المتاحة.
ui.panel.config.zwave.node_management.no: تحديد عقدة لعرض خيارات كل عقدة
ui.panel.config.zwave.ozw_log.introducti: View the log. 0 is the minimum (loads entire log) and 1000 is the maximum. Load will show a static log and tail will auto update with the last specified number of lines of the log.
ui.panel.config.zwave.network_status.net: This may take a while depending on the size of your network.
Awake nodes have been queried. Sleeping nodes will be queried when they wake.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.dashboard.intro: Manage your Z-Wave network and Z-Wave nodes
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.dashboard.dump_: Download a dump of your network to help diagnose issues
Some of your nodes are dead
Some of your nodes didn't respond and are assumed dead. These will not be fully exported.
Not all nodes are ready yet
If you create an export while not all nodes are ready, you could miss needed data. Give your network some time to query all nodes. Do you want to continue with the dump?
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.int: Manage and adjust device (node) specific configuration parameters for the selected device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.att: Device configuration parameters and descriptions are provided by the {device_database}
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.bat: Battery devices must be awake to update their config. Please refer to your device manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.set: The parameter change has been queued, and will be updated when the device wakes up.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.title: Add a Z-Wave Node
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.introd: This wizard will guide you through adding a node to your Z-Wave network.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.secure: Secure devices require additional bandwidth; too many secure devices can slow down your Z-Wave network. We recommend only using secure inclusion for devices that require it, like locks or garage door openers.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.contro: أصبحت وحدة التحكم Z-Wave الآن في وضع التضمين.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.follow: اتبع الإرشادات المرفقة مع جهازك لبدء الاقتران على الجهاز.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.inclus: The node could not be added. Please check the logs for more information.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.add_node.interv: The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.int: Remove a node from your Z-Wave network, and remove the associated device and entities from ioBroker.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.con: Your Z-Wave controller is now in exclusion mode.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.fol: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger exclusion on the device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.exc: The node could not be removed. Please check the logs for more information.
Node {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.reinterview_nod: Re-interview a device on your Z-Wave network. Use this feature if your device has missing or incorrect functionality.
You will need to wake battery powered devices before starting the re-interview. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
You can close this dialog and the interview will continue in the background.
The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.

ui.panel.config.zwave_js.logs.subscribed: Subscribed to Z-Wave JS Log Messages...
